creator: time_fly@163.com
text:
Installation log print SSL port with HTTP port.

ServerPort = 80
ServerSslPort = 80

No matter what port number write during instllation for SSL, ServerSslPort will be the same as ServerPort.

And I found how to fix it:

In conf/original/instlalwinconf.awk

print " ServerSslPort = " serverport >tstfl;

should be:

print " ServerSslPort = " serversslport >tstfl;

Wish it fixed in the next release.

creator: christophe.jaillet@wanadoo.fr
text:
This has been fixed on trunk :
http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=revision&sortby=date&revision=1375041

On 2.4 branches
http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=revision&sortby=date&revision=1390511


But not on 2.2 branch yet.


Moreover, according to the date on the commit on trunk and on 2.4, I think that no official release with this patch has been profided yet.
